page.title: 02BOAT BUILDING IN ST. ERNEY
page.content: { A new world of boats has appeared on the banks of the River Lynher near Landrake. It has transformed disused Treluggan Quarry,into one of the most imaginative marine projects to have been started in the south east of Cornwall for many years. {Boating World}was the brainchild of a West Midlands businessman who came to Cornwall seeking the perfect site for his plan for a complete marine centre.He looked for three years before finding the quarry two miles from Landrake complete with buildings and even its own quay and slipway. "It was exactly what I was looking for. The land was hard and tarmaced with about five acres of flat ground plus a factory,offices and other buildings.
